resources.string:
1. Start the Game: Press ony any of the 4 buttons to begin the game. As soon as you press the button, the timer will start. 
2. Answer Questions: You will be presented with a series of arithmetic questions. Answer them as quickly as you can. 
3. Scoring: Each correct answer will earn you 10 points. 
4. Lives: You start the game with 3 lives. Every time you answer a question incorrectly, you lose a life. The game ends when you have lost all your lives. 
5. Timer: You have 1 minute to answer each problem. If the timer runs out before you respond, you lose a life. The game ends when the timer runs out. 
6. End of Game: At the end of the game, your score will be displayed. Try to beat your high score!
